Piratini, December 9, 1838. Most Illustrious Sir

I acknowledge the receipt of your letter of the 3rd of this month and in response to the same I inform you that the orders required will be issued tomorrow.

God keep Your Lordship  
Finance Secretariat in Piratini, December 9, 1838.  
Most Illustrious Sir  
João Antônio da Silveira, Commander of the Right Division.  
Domingos José de Almeida
